p: The α-glucans + d-glucose from sucrose+ free d-glucose in wild mushrooms ranged from 0.70 g/100 g DM in Suillus grevillei to 8.57 g/100 g DM in Russulla heterophylla. This is in line with previous studies, where the α-glucan content in cultivated and wild mushrooms was usually less than 10 g/100 g DW [ 14, 30, 43].
